rooms.description: A welcoming entrance hall with open space for transition from outdoors.
Large living area designed to enhance natural light and ventilation with large windows facing the courtyard.
Adjacent to the living room, incorporating Vastu principles for social interactions.
Functional kitchen area with adequate natural light and ventilation, placed in the south-east direction as per Vastu.
A central open space designed to promote air flow and natural lighting; landscaped with plants.
Spacious master bedroom placed on the east side for morning light.
Adjacent to the living room and courtyard, offering a transitional outdoor space with natural ventilation.
Guest bedroom designed to provide privacy and natural light.
Functional bathroom with ventilation windows for a comfortable environment.
Expansive terrace with views of the courtyard and natural surroundings; designed for relaxation and social gatherings.
